name: Screenbound
storyline:
Enter the unique world of Screenbound, where your Quantum boy (Qboy) transports you into a weird dual-dimensional space that occupies 5D = 3d + 2d.

So how the heck did this happen?
Your mom invented the device and you found it in the garage.
She was keeping it secret all this time, and other dark secrets start to come out as you delve deeper.
You'll find other stuff too. But let's not spoil the plot.
summary: Screenbound is a platformer unlike any other. You move in first-person view at the same time while playing in 2d on the screen of your Qboy. Mind-bending environmental puzzles will force you to test the limits of dimensional space. Your jumping and movements are mirrored - but certain things affect the opposite dimension. Combat is in 2d and you will receive your loot in 3d.
